sentences.sContent: The camcorder winds the tape back or forward at high speed.
sentences.sContent_eng: The camcorder winds the tape back or forward at high speed.
sentences.sCn: 这款便携式摄像机可以使录像带快速倒回或前进。

sentences.sContent: Even carrying the camcorder while hiking in the forest was an effort.
sentences.sContent_eng: Even carrying the camcorder while hiking in the forest was an effort.
sentences.sCn: 在森林中徒步旅行时，即便带的是便携式摄像机也非常费力。

sentences.sContent: Your camcorder should have these basic features: autofocus, playback facility, zoom lens.
sentences.sContent_eng: Your camcorder should have these basic features: autofocus, playback facility, zoom lens.
sentences.sCn: 你的便携式摄像机应该具备以下基本功能：自动聚焦、回放功能、变焦镜头。

trans.tranOther: a type of camera that records pictures and sound on  videotape
